biocontainers.name: faststructure
biocontainers.summary: A variational framework for inferring population structure from SNP genotype data.

biotools.summary: fastStructure is an algorithm for inferring population structure from large SNP genotype data. It is based on a variational Bayesian framework for posterior inference and is written in Python2.x.

bioschemas.name: fastSTRUCTURE
bioschemas.summary: fastStructure is an algorithm for inferring population structure from large SNP genotype data. It is based on a variational Bayesian framework for posterior inference and is written in Python2.x.
